title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water.
Combine pasta with pancetta, then mix with egg and cheese mixture.
Serve with a generous amount of black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with tikka masala paste.
Cook onions until golden, then add tomatoes and cream.
Add the grilled chicken and serve with coriander.
